articles.title: Asia Cup 2022: Pakistan set up rematch vs India on Sunday after hammering Hong Kong - India Today
articles.description: Asia Cup 2022: Pakistan outclassed Hong Kong by a mammoth margin of 155 runs to qualify for Super Four. After the big win on Friday in Sharjah, Pakistan have set-up a rematch with India in Dubai on Sunday, September 4.

articles.description: Asia Cup 2022: Ravindra Jadeja suffered a knee injury that has ruled him out of the remainder of the tournament, with Axar Patel named as his replacement.
